name: Glass Galaxies - a theme for Bungie.net
description: This style is a custom theme for use on Bungie.net. It re-skins the website to give the page elements a shiny, glassy appearance. This is the Alpha version, so it isn't yet complete and may not work as intended. If you find any problems or have any feedback, please post it here: http://www.bungie.net/Forums/posts.aspx?postID=27428424 or send me a private message on Bungie.net (username: Zoidberg25).
